summary: Website to resize images and enhance photo quality.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal flat logo combining a photo/camera motif with resize arrows, dark/neutral palette (logo-photo-resizer.dim_512x512.png)
- Subtle repeating background texture with light grain and geometric shapes, neutral warm gray tones (bg-texture.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page web app that lets users upload an image (JPG/PNG/WebP) via file picker and drag-and-drop, then shows a preview and basic image information (filename, dimensions, file size).

Implement image resizing controls that allow the user to set target width/height, maintain aspect ratio toggle, and choose a resize mode (fit/contain vs fill/cover), then apply the resize and update the preview.

Provide “photo quality” enhancement controls implemented client-side (no external AI services), including at minimum: sharpen, brightness, contrast, saturation, and a “reduce noise”/smoothing control; applying enhancements must update the preview and be reversible (reset to original).
Allow users to export/download the processed image with format options (PNG and JPEG at minimum) and, for JPEG/WebP outputs, a quality slider (e.g., 1–100).
Add a clear, consistent visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a photo tool; avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
Use generated static brand assets in the UI (logo and a subtle background texture) by placing them in frontend/public/assets/generated and referencing them directly from the frontend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website that lets users resize images and enhance/improve photo quality.
